descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Continuation of 344-1. Fundamental groups. Language of categories. Covering spaces. Prerequisite for 344-1: 320-1 or equivalent; for 344-2: 344-1 and 330-1 or equivalent.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite for 344-1: 320-1 or equivalent; for 344-2: 344-1 and 330-1 or equivalent.
